content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: prismarine_wall
inventory=[{"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 18}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 38, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 58, "index": 44}, {"type": "prismarine", "quantity": 6, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft prismarine_wall, I need to place 6 prismarine blocks in a 2x3 formation in the crafting table. Since there are 6 prismarine blocks at slot 45, I will first move 1 of them into the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that the first prismarine block is placed in the crafting table, I will move the next one to the right of it (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 2 with quantity 1
